alert-config-1.alert-message:
[nemail_message]

This email was sent via REDCap.

Email addresses can be added to, removed from, or updated on the mailing list for this site by updating the [site_details_arm_3][form-link:notification_email_addresses] form.

alert-config-2.alert-message:
Hello,

This is an automated email for site [site_details_arm_3][ref_id_arm3_dag_pfx] [site_details_arm_3][arm3_site_shortlabel] that the start date for Phase 3b - NEWS-HEAT and comparator implementation phase has been updated in the database and is now scheduled to commence on [site_details_arm_3][]. 

Please be sure to refresh project setup and data on the REDCap Mobile App, which you can do by following the steps below:

  1. Open the REDCap Mobile App
  2. Log in using the Username and PIN
  3. Tap "My Projects"
  4. Tap "NEWS-HEAT"
  5. Check to see if "Send Data to Server" is shown below "Collect Data". 
    1. If so, tap "Send Data to Server"
    2. Then, tap "Begin Send of All Data"
    3. Tap "Yes" for GPS coordinates to be sent
    4. Wait for this process to complete*
    5. Then, tap "Options" and tap "Return to project"
  6. Scroll down until you see "Refresh Setup & Data" (Should be below "Sync Archive" and above "Download Server Records")
  7. Tap "Refresh Setup & Data"
  8. Tap "Proceed"
  9. Tap "Proceed" again
  10. Tap "Download All X Records" to ensure the Mobile App has up-to-date data

*If there are any issues with sending data to the server, please take a screenshot or screenshot(s) of the issue, and then go to the project home page (Steps 1-4) and scroll down until you see "Send Emergency Data Dump", tap this, then "All Records", then "Proceed with Emergency Send", and finally "Both" (saving the data dump to both the external REDCap server and to the device).  Verify that a pop-up appears saying "The document has been successfully uploaded to REDCap". This will ensure no data is lost. After this, please notify the NEWS-HEAT team and let us know what happened along with your screenshot. Then you can proceed as usual from step 6 to refresh the project setup & data.

Kind regards,

NEWS-HEAT

Email addresses can be added to, removed from, or updated on the mailing list for this site by updating the [site_details_arm_3][form-url:site_phase_dates_addtl_info] form.
alert-config-2.email-subject: IMPORTANT: Refresh NEWS-HEAT Project Setup and Data! Update to start date for Phase 3b (NEWS-HEAT and comparator implementation phase)
